title: Waiting for the Tide
marks:
Signature, Title, Marks, Inscription, and Label

description: scene of various moored boats in a calm bay in foreground; small village in middle ground; rolling green hills and purple mountains in background; scene has slightly orange cast reflecting time of day
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
